## Project Summary

Flask web application with user authentication (login/signup) and dashboard.

**Tech Stack**: Python, Flask, SQLAlchemy, Flask-Login, SQLite, Bootstrap 5

**Key Files Created**:
- `run.py` - Application entry point
- `app/__init__.py` - Flask app factory
- `app/models.py` - User database model
- `app/routes/auth.py` - Authentication routes
- `app/routes/dashboard.py` - Dashboard routes
- `app/templates/` - HTML templates (base, login, signup, dashboard, profile)
- `app/static/css/style.css` - Custom styling
- `requirements.txt` - Python dependencies
- `README.md` - Complete documentation
